item.content:encoded:
Price: $35.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:45:43 UTC – Details)


Loomla: Provide your pets with a high-quality daily life.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.66 x 8.66 x 5.9 inches; 1.98 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ VC1402
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Shenzhen Jiangrui Investment Development
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08NKF9PLS

High Capacity – Staying hydrated can be a challenge for pets, especially during the summer months. The Loomla stainless steel cat water fountain is your answer to a long-lasting water supply for small pets in your home. The dog and cat water fountain holds 85 ounces, it’s enough water for a small animal for almost a week! The water level window shows you how much is left in the cat and dog water bowl dispenser, so your pet can stay hydrated and not get thirsty.
Whisper-quiet – This water fountain for cats inside has a water pump that is so quiet, you’d never know it’s there! The low noise water dispenser for cats and dogs is a great way to help your pets stay calm and hydrated at night. Many animals are frightened by loud noises, so the quiet design of this dog and cat fountain water bowl makes it more enticing for animal owners who want their pets healthy and content.
Entertainment For Your Pet – Our cat and dog water fountain was designed with your pets in mind and provides an easy way for them to quench their thirst while having fun at the same time! A pet water fountain can be just the cool thing you need in order to keep your little buddy hydrated and entertained. Pet supplies water fountains are an amusing way of making water enjoyable for animals.
Always Clean & Fresh Water – Don’t let your pets go thirsty! Our pet fountain is a great way to keep your furry friends hydrated. The dog and cat water dispenser ensures that no matter how busy you might be, they’ll always have clean and fresh water to drink. The cat and dog water dispenser filter uses multiple purification systems, it purifies the water using carbon non-woven fabric and ion exchange resin. 2 exchange filters are included with the dog and cat supplies water fountain.

Why should you choose the Loomla Water Fountains?

  • Fun for your pet – For your pets drinking from a drinking fountain is way more interesting and fun than just drinking out of their bowl.
  • Stylish Design – The pet drinking fountain has lovely and stylish bellflower design and comes in a variety of colors that make it an attractive home decor item.
  • 3 Water Flow Settings – Adjusting the automatic water dispenser settings to match your pet’s size and tastes is easy. Just choose one of our automatic drink dispenser modes: Flower waterfall / Waterfall and fountain / Fountain
  • Healthy choice – Clean water is one of the most important aspects of your pet’s health. Pet water fountain filter has an upgraded sophisticated filtration system that filters water better than ever before.
  • Easy Installation – Our automatic dog water dispenser is easy to set up, just affix the pump, install led next to the water level window, add filter and drinking dish on top, and you are good to go! We also provide a manual with our water fountain for dogs inside.

Read more

Structure of Loomla Fountain

Take Good Care of Your Pet

What should you pay attention to?

  1. The fountain’s LED lights have two modes that can be controlled on and off.
  2. The pump has two locating holes to assist installation.
  3. Please use it indoors on a flat surface.
  4. For your pet’s health and safety, clean the water pump at least once every two weeks.
  5. To provide clean enough water continuously, please replace the filter and the sponge every two or three weeks, and rinse the filter with water before use.
  6. Please be careful to prevent pets from chewing the wires and swallowing the parts.

What You Will Get:

1 x Pet Water Fountain（8.66 x 8.66 x 5.9in）

1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）

1 x DC Pump (with a 70.9in cord）

2 x Filters

1 x Pre-filter Sponge

1 x Instruction Manual

item.content:encoded:
Price: $31.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:28:34 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Two pack you will get: 1* cat feeder, 1* cat water dispenser. Food Grade Material: Our pet feeder made of food grade plastic, 100% BPA Free. Protect your pet’s health.Fresh Water and Food Anytime: The automatic cat feeders refills with water and food as it empties, keeping water and food fresh inside the reservoir until it dispenses.1 gallon Large capacity: You can rest assured to go on vacation, work, party after choose our automatic cat feeders.Easy to Clean: The bottle is easy to unscrew from the base of the dog feeder and features a wide mouth for convenient hand-washing.

With automatic gravity flow technology, the automatic pet feeder no electricity required at all, can be used both indoor and outdoor.The Structure of our automatic dog feeder is stable, will not tip over.

High Quality Materials

The automatic pet feeder is made from high-quality plastic material, BPA – free, safe, healthy and environmental protection, perfect care of your love pet.

Easy to Add Food

Uncover the cap on the top of the dog food bowls, you can add dry pet food easily. After the lid is closed, the grain can be kept away from damp and moldy with a good sealing.

Large Groove

With 15 degree carefully slope and a large groove of the pet feeder, Food comes out smoothly and no food stuck, friendly for pets to eat and drink.

Non-slip Rubber Feet

Non-slip rubber feet under the base of dog feeder and dog water dispenser for secure safe placement. The automatic dog feeder can be used both indoor or outdoor with no electric needed.

Siphon Design

The screw cover the bottle of the dog water bowl dispenser is made of siphon design. When the water in the dog water bowl reaches a certain height, the spring device which on the cat water dispenser will close and the water stops flowing automatically.

3.8L Big capacity

The cat water bowl can hold about 3.8 L water, can satisfy your small medium or big pets at the same time, about 7 days for small pets, 3 days for big pets.

Questions and Answers：

Q: Will my dog eat much more than he need as this is automatic?A: Usually, the first day when he use the automatic dog feeder, maybe he will eat much, but our pets are smarter than we think, They will slowly quit this bad habit.Q: Will the water overflow?A: When the water in the water tank reaches a certain height, the spring device in the middle of the barrel mouth will automatically close, and the water will stop flowing; when the water is below a certain height, the spring device will automatically open and continue to flow out.Q: How is the quality? does it have smell?Our dog water bowl dispenser and dog food bowls set is made from food grade plastic material, it is safe and tasteless.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 27 x 17.5 x 35.5 inches; 3.95 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 22, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Hipidog
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08X4J54R1

[High Quality Food Grade Materials]: The automatic water dispenser for dogs is made from high-quality plastic material, BPA – free, safe, healthy and environmental protection, perfect care of your love pet. The cat bowls for food and water is 100% new material, anti-fall durable.
[Automatic Refills Food and Water with Gravity]: Automatic cat feeders system with self-gravity feeding design for this automatic pet feeder, to dispense dry food as pets empty the bowl, prolonging time between refills. The water bowls for large dogs adopt siphon device design, can perfect prevention of water leakage, control the speed of drinking water supply to prevent overflow.
[Big Capacity for Small Medium Large Pets]: Both cat food dispenser and cat water dispenser with large capacity 3.8L. Can last about 7 days for small pets, 3 days for big pets. You can rest assured to go on vacation, work, party, do not have to worry about pets will be hungry.
[Humanization Design Convenient to Use]: With 15 degree carefully slope design, The dog food bowls will not stuck food. The upgraded base is thicker and heavier, would not tip over when pets eating. And non-skid rubber feet under the dog feeder and dog water bottle dispenser for secure placement. Moreover, barrel and chassis of the automatic dog feeder can be split, you can rinse it directly with water. It is recommended to wash once a week.

  • Two pack you will get: 1* cat feeder, 1* cat water dispenser.
  • Food Grade Material: Our pet feeder made of food grade plastic, 100% BPA Free. Protect your pet’s health.
  • Fresh Water and Food Anytime: The automatic cat feeders refills with water and food as it empties, keeping water and food fresh inside the reservoir until it dispenses.
  • 1 gallon Large capacity: You can rest assured to go on vacation, work, party after choose our automatic cat feeders.
  • Easy to Clean: The bottle is easy to unscrew from the base of the dog feeder and features a wide mouth for convenient hand-washing.

In 2016, a 5-person team with the same dream and determination founded Tomxcute. Double filtration system: Equipped with activated carbon filter and pre-filter sponge, the automatic cat and dog water fountain can provide your pet with pure drinking water and keep healthy.
3.2 L/108 Oz Large Capacity: The capacity of water fountain is 3.2L, and the high and low water level lines are marked in the container, and the effective volume is more than 3L, very suitable for multi-pet families.
Ultra-quiet: The 1.5W pump is super silent when running, keep it below 20db, only the sound of water flow can be heard, even if it runs at night, it will not affect your sleep.
Encourage Drinking : This cat water fountain is equipped with a faucet and spring surge modes which match Habits of drinking water under the tap of cats, dogs. The dynamic water flow helps attract pets to drink,which can prevent your pet suffering from urinary and kidney diseases.
Customer Support: For any questions, support or complaint, please feel free to contact us, we will help you solve the problem 24H.

Dual Filtration pet water fountain

Filter hair, debris and large particles, remove odor and impurities.Protect the drinking water health of pets such as cats and dogs.

Easy to clean

TOMXCUTE which can be washed by hand or machine washed in the dishwasher. It is recommended to clean once a week.

stainless steel pet fountain

our pet fountain is made of imported total 304 stainless,High grade Stainless Steel Drinking Fountain is unbreakable, durable and easy to clean

Read more

Sleep-like quiet

The noise level is less than 20 decibels, creating a more quiet and comfortable environment for you and your pet, No power consumption too much.

Large capacity

No matter where you go, you don’t have to worry about pet drinking water. 3.2L large-capacity pet water dispenser.

5.What You Will Get:

1 x Pet Water Fountain, 1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）, 1 x Pre-filter Sponge, 1 x DC Pump, 3 x Filters, 1 x Instruction Manual

Read more

According to the various behaviors of pets, the faucet type pet water dispenser is more favored by cats and dogs

Q: How often should I clean the drinking fountain?

A: We recommend cleaning the water dispenser every two weeks.

Q: How can I get the filters for 2-4week replacements?

A: We also sell the replacement filters online. If you have any questions, please feel free to find us.( 3 carbon filters included in the package of the cat fountain )

Q: How can I judge the water level in the drinking fountain?

A: Due to technical difficulty, it is not easy to provide a visible window for the stainless steel water dispenser, but we have marked the “MIN” and “MAX” lines in the water tank.

Q: What should I pay attention to about the pump?

A: Firstly, the pump should be cleaned every 2 week; then if the water level in the tank is too low, the water pump still keeps running and prone to fail. Please add water to the water tank in time.

Q: How long is the power cable?

A: The length of the cable is 180 cm.

Q. Noise Level Up ？

Check if it`s empty or water level drop below minimum, then refill the fountain under max level. Check if there are hairs blocking the impeller of the water pump.Sometimes the impeller was totally encrusted in calcium. Please clean the pump weekly to extend the life , and more importantly, it is healthier for pets to drink water.Any questions and concerns, please send message to us on Amazon, and we will give you a satisfied solution within 16 hours.

Warranty & Support

For warranty information about this product, please Click here [PDF ]

Price: $86.99 - $40.87
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:18:55 UTC – Details)


DIY and professional mechanics trust Schumacher Electric’s extensive line of battery chargers and maintainers to keep their automotive, power sports, motorcycle, and marine batteries in top condition. The Schumacher SC1280 15A 6V/12V Fully Automatic Battery Charger and Maintainer is specifically designed to keep your 6V and 12V batteries fully charged and in optimum health. With a 15A rapid charge and a 3A charge/maintain mode, the SC1280 charges batteries quickly and then maintains a full charge while connected. Choose the 15A rate for charging automotive, marine, and light truck batteries. For smaller batteries, such as those used in garden tractors, snowmobiles, and motorcycles, select the 3A rate. Microprocessor controlled, the Schumacher SC1280 automatically adjusts the amperage rate during charging and maintaining as necessary. The unit also features auto voltage detection, float mode monitoring to maintain optimal battery charge, and multi-stage charging. Additional features include reverse hook-up protection, bad battery detection, a digital display, LED indicators, push-button controls, and color-coded clamps.
FULLY AUTOMATIC: The Schumacher SC1280 automatically detects 6V and 12V batteries. When the battery is fully charged, the unit automatically stops charging and shifts to maintain mode.
MICROPROCESSOR CONTROLLED: After gathering information from the connected battery, the microprocessor adjusts voltage and charge, allowing fast charging without negatively impacting battery capacity and longevity.
BOOST BATTERY HEALTH: The unit features multi-stage charging and float-mode monitoring for optimum battery health and extended battery life.
COMPATIBLE BATTERIES: The Schumacher SC1280 will charge 6V and 12V standard, AGM, gel, and deep-cycle batteries.
REVERSE HOOK-UP PROTECTION: With advanced reverse hook-up protection, the charger protects against damage if the clamps are not properly connected.

Essential Charging and Maintaining

Keep Batteries in Top Condition

Keep 12V batteries in optimum condition with the Schumacher SC1280 15A 6V/12V Fully Automatic Battery Charger and Maintainer. The SC1280 features auto voltage detection, multi-stage charging, float mode monitoring, bad battery detection, and reverse hook-up protection.

Advanced Battery Charging Technology

FLOAT MODE MONITORING

While in float mode, a battery maintainer delivers a small current when necessary to keep the unit fully charged.

MULTI-STAGE CHARGING

Keep your batteries in top condition with Schumacher’s advanced charging algorithm for optimum battery health.

BUILT-IN SAFETY

The SC1280 prevents battery damage with reverse hook-up protection, which stops the charger from operating if the clamps are reversed.

MULTI-FUNCTION DISPLAY

Use the display to check battery voltage, charging status, and percent of charge. The LEDs denote charging and maintain status and clamps reversed.

YOU CAN RELY ON SCHUMACHER

KEEP IT ROLLING WITH SCHUMACHER’S LINE OF BATTERY CHARGERS/MAINTAINERS

Professional mechanics and automotive enthusiasts trust Schumacher Electric to provide high-quality and innovative automotive products. Since 1947, Schumacher has been designing and producing industry-leading power conversion technology. Schumacher’s current range of products includes EV chargers, traditional battery chargers, maintainers, jump starters, portable power stations, diagnostic tools, battery accessories, LED work lights, lithium-powered products, and more.


Previous page

  1. HOME GARAGE

    Every home garage should have a quality Schumacher battery charger/maintainer.

  2. POWER SPORT RIDERS

    The SC1280 ensures that your motorcycle, ATV, and other power sports batteries are ready to play.

  3. CAR RESTORERS

    The unit’s maintain mode can keep your battery in top condition during restoration.

  4. BOATERS

    The unit can be used to maintain marine batteries, although they should be maintained on shore.

Next page

From the brand

Drink happier and healthier

How did we get our start?

WOPET was founded in 2015 in CA,USA,JP,EU at the same time, our version that brings joy and happiness to every pet lover in the world.

Why do we love what we do?

WOPET team all love pets and technology and truly believe that every pet deserves a long and healthy life full of happiness and love.

What makes our products unique?

We are determined to create a boundless high-quality life for people with love and technology, and aimed at provide care for the value of life, and let pet owners get rid of the constraints of time and space.

W300 Cat Water Fountain

Multiple Filtration：WOPET W300 pet water fountain has a triple filtration system. The sponge captures bulky contaminants like pet fur and debris. The ion exchange resin layer softens tap water, and the activated carbon removes nasty flavors and scents.Change the filter every 1 week will be more healthier!
BPA FREE & High-End Materials: Our W300 cat water fountain is BPA free, durable, and it’s easy to operate and clean,Make your pet fall in love with drinking water, no need to worry their health problem any longer.
Ultra-Quiet Pump: The pump is whisper-quiet and stays below 35 decibels. Low-voltage pump is reliable and usually lasts 2 years. The pump is detachable and replaceable.
Easy to Set Up and Clean: WOPET W300 cat drinking fountain is easy to assemble and disassemble for cleaning and replacement. Note：the pet fountain Doesn’t come with a wall plug. It is recommended to use a 5V, 1A adapter or power bank to operate it.


At WOpet, we all love pets and technology. Our vision is to bring joy and happiness to every pet lover in the world.




WOPET was founded in 2015 in USA,CA,JP,EU. Wopet will use its innovative scientific and technological capabilities and persistent sense of social responsibility to provide a more complete boundless pet loving experience for pet families around the world.

  • 2L Large Water Capacity
  • Dishwasher safe
  • Silent Running
  • User Manual*1
  • Brush*1
  • Filter*1

WOPET Pet Water Fountain is made of high quality ABS material, which is BPA-free, durable, safe and easy to assemble and clean.

2 Flow Designs could attract pets to drink more water.

Visible Water Level could check the water level at any time, and always know the capacity of the bucket to ensure that pets drink enough water.

  • Please clean the water fountain every 3-4 days;
  • Please clean pumps every 2-4 weeks;
  • Please replace the filter every 2 weeks;
  • Please fill in water in time when the water level reaches Min.

Read more




Emergency Water Storage

With a water storage capacity of about 80ml, the water tray can still provide water for your pets when power outage occurs.

Visible Water Level

Check the water level at any time, and always know the capacity of the bucket to ensure that pets drink enough water.

Two Drinking modes

Flower waterfall or gentle fountain let your pets to choose!

Read more



Cleaning the pump is essential to extend water fountain life and keep the water fresh. Please clean the pump at least every two weeks.

The steps of cleaning the pump

Step 1. Remove the sponge

Step 2. Remove the Pump Connector Rubber

Step 3. Remove the pump cover

Step 4. Remove the impeller

Step 5. Clean the parts with dish soap and warm water

Read more


Important Reminders:

1. For indoor use only!

2. For the health of your pet, it is suggested to change the water and clean the fountain every week. Especially the small grooves on the fountain can be cleaned every day. Small grooves are designed to filter impurities, allowing pets to drink healthier water.

3. Sometimes loud fountains are the consequence of a low water level or a dirty impeller. Clean your fountain’s impeller and ensure the water reaches to at least the minimum level in the water bowl. The lowest water level is more than the water outlet of the pump.

4. According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, Change the filter every 1 week will be healthier!

5. Please keep the cable hidden to prevent pets from chewing it.

6. WOPET Never Authorized any sellers to sell official genuine filters. For your pet’s health and safety, please search “B0B5Q4N6Q2” to purchase the real WOPET W300 Filters,DO NOT use the cheap and pirated filters.

7.Make sure the filter is SOAKED, The water needs to flow through it and it will just spill over if the filter isn’t soaked thoroughly.

Veken is dedicated to bringing our customers premium, high-quality, and functional household products, pet supplies and travel accessories at reasonable prices.

Our vision is to continuously innovate and improve our products based on customer needs as well as current industry trends. Our customer centric approach means customers always come first.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.4 x 8.4 x 5.3 inches; 2.18 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ VK663
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 12, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Veken
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08NC54VZN
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

High-quality: Made of food grade materials, this drinking fountain is BPA free, durable, and easy to operate and clean. The water-level window and LED Light let you observe how much water your pets drink in real time, and lets you see exactly when you need to fill the water bowl. There is a switch on the wire to control the light so you could easily turn it on or off.
Two flow designs: The Veken Pet Fountain has 2 modes: flower waterfall (faucet drinking) and the gentle fountain. The water streaming down the petals of the flower on the fountain will draw your pets attention and encourage animals to drink more often.
Triple-filtration system: In addition to keeping water fresh via circulation, the triple-filtration system, including activated carbon layer, ion exchange resin and thick non-woven fabric, keeps water better tasting and safer for pets.
Ultra-quiet pump: The pump on this water dispenser is ultra-quiet, has low-energy consumption and will last 1.5-2 years.

Benefits of Choosing Us

Appeal to your pet’s natural instincts

In the wild running water is often safer to drink than still water and your pet knows that. A water bowl sitting out near their food could be unappealing. Cats and dogs are naturally attracted to running water being dispensed from a fountain, appealing to their natural instincts.

Your right-hand man in life

2.8L is suitable for multiple pet homes. The fountain is very easy to operate and clean. If you are looking for an advanced water fountain or your pet has any drinking problems, Veken will be the right choice for you and your pet.

The third water flow setting

You can remove the cap to form a flower bubble to increase the water flow for pets to drink. This fountain has various flow modes so its easy to find the option that is best for your pet. When placing the cap on the flower, make sure the ridge aligns with the notch on the flower.

Read more

What You Will Get:

  • 1 x Pet Water Fountain（8.3 x 8.3 x 6.6in）
  • 1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）
  • 1 x DC Pump （with a 6ft power cord）
  • 2 x Filters
  • 1 x Pre-filter Sponge
  • 1 x Instruction Manual

Cleaning the pump is essential to the longevity of the fountain. Please clean the pump at least every 2 weeks.

Step 1. Remove the sponge

Step 2. Remove the pump cover

Step 3. Remove the impeller

Step 4. Clean the parts with dish soap and warm water

Read more





Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Replacement Filters 84oz Pet Fountain 100oz Pet Fountain Dog Grooming Kit 84oz Pet Fountain Replacement Pump

Important Reminders:

1. For indoor use only!

2. For the health of your pet, it is suggested to change the water and clean the fountain every week.

3. Sometimes loud fountains are the consequence of a low water level or a dirty impeller. Clean your fountain’s impeller and ensure the water reaches to at least the minimum level in the water bowl.

4. To prevent the activated carbon dust (it will not harm your pets) from shedding, please soak the filter in water for 2 minutes and rinse it thoroughly under running water before use. It is recommended to flush the filter and sponge with water every time you change the water.

5. According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, replace the filter and the sponge every 2 to 3 weeks.

6. Please place the pump inside the square indention and make sure the double probe face towards the clear window in the water bowl.

7. Please keep the cable hidden to prevent pets from chewing it.

This 2-Piece Klein Tools Wire Stripper and Ratcheting Crimper tool kit is perfect for crimping, wire stripping and cutting. The full-cycle Ratcheting Crimper crimps 10-22 AWG insulated wire terminals. The Self-Adjusting Wire Stripper / Cutter features a self-adjusting stripping head for quick, precise wire stripping. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn’t just the name of our company, it’s also our family name. And since we’re an American company that’s family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.
Wire Stripper and Crimper 2-Piece Tool Kit includes everything a tradesman needs for insulated terminal crimping, wire stripping and cutting
Ratcheting Crimper (Cat No. 3005CR) crimps only insulated terminals onto 10-22 AWG stranded copper wire
Adjustable compound action design puts more crimping power into each squeeze
Three crimping cavities in one tool: 22–16 AWG (Red), 16–14 AWG (Blue) and 12–10 AWG (Yellow) insulated terminals
Wire Stripper and Cutter (Cat. No. 11061) with stripping head that adjusts to strip: 10-20 AWG solid, 12-22 AWG stranded, and 12/2 and 14/2 Romex cable (all sizes) and other nonmetallic (type NM) sheathed cable self adjusts
Adjustable stopper to control the length of the core strip
Tensioning thumb wheel allows for precise stripping of smaller gauge wire

Read more

About Klein Tools

As an American manufacturer of hand tools for more than 160 years, Klein Tools makes premium-quality, professional-grade tools that deliver performance, durability and precision. Our team continues to put six generations of expertise into each tool by using the highest quality materials and superior workmanship.

Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.

Wiring Tool Kit with Automatic Wire Stripper and Ratcheting Crimper, Great Electrical Tool Kit, 2-Piece

This 2-Piece Klein Tools Wire Stripper and Ratcheting Crimper tool kit is perfect for crimping, wire stripping and cutting. The full-cycle Ratcheting Crimper crimps 10-22 AWG insulated wire terminals. The Self-Adjusting Wire Stripper / Cutter features a self-adjusting stripping head for quick, precise wire stripping.

  • Ratcheting Crimper (Cat No. 3005CR) crimps only insulated terminals onto 10-22 AWG stranded copper wire
  • Adjustable compound action design puts more crimping power into each squeeze
  • Three crimping cavities in one tool: 22–16 AWG (Red), 16–14 AWG (Blue) and 12–10 AWG (Yellow) insulated terminals
  • Wire Stripper and Cutter (Cat. No. 11061) with stripping head that adjusts to strip: 10-20 AWG solid, 12-22 AWG stranded & 12/2 & 14/2 Romex cable (all sizes) & others (type NM) sheathed cable adjusts
  • Adjustable stopper to control the length of the core strip
  • Tensioning thumb wheel allows for precise stripping of smaller gauge wire
  • Convenient wire cutter in handle

Product Description

Small & Big Dogs and Cats Automatic Food and Water Feeder Set

3.8L Big Capacity

Both cat dog feeder and waterer measures 35.5 x 17.5 x 27 cm / 13.97 x 6.89 x 10.63 inch.Large capacity 3.8L, can last about 7 days for small pets, 3 days for big pets, travel Accessories.you can rest assured to go on vacation, work, party.

Pets Gravity Food and Water Dispenser set

Automatic Gravity Flow Technology

The food feer and water dispenser adopt Natural Gravity Supply System, food and water will gradually fill for pets eat and drink. It is no electricity required at all, can be used anywhere, and suitable for both indoor and outdoor use. perfect for pet parents with busy lifestyles.

Food Grade Material: Our feeder and waterer made of food grade plastic, 100% BPA Free. Protect your pet’s health. Fresh Water and Food Anytime: The bowl refills with water/ food as it empties, keeping water and food fresh inside the reservoir until it dispenses. Non-slip Rubber Feet: Non-slip rubber feet ensure safe placement. Easy to Clean: The bottle is easy to unscrew from the base and features a wide mouth bottle for convenient hand-washing.

Questions and Answers：

Q: Will my dog eat much more than he need as this is automatic?A: Usually,the first day when he use it, maybe he will eat much, but our pets are smarter than we think, They will slowly quit this bad habit.Q: Will the water overflow?A: When the water in the water tank reaches a certain height, the spring device in the middle of the barrel mouth will automatically close, and the water will stop flowing; when the water is below a certain height, the spring device will automatically open and continue to flow out.Q: How is the quality? does it have smell?A: We use food grade plastic material, safe and tasteless.

1.Automatic supply feeder and waterer set: Natural gravity supply system, no electricity required, Eco-friendly and can be used anywhere.
2.Size and Capacity: both feeder and waterer measures 32x21x32cm;large capacity 3.8L, can last about 7days for small pets,3 days for big pets, you can rest assured to go on vacation, work, party, do not have to worry about pets will be hungry.
3.Humanization design: Side cut-out handles for easy lifting and cleaning,non-skid rubber feet for secure placement.
4.Easy to clean: barrel and chassis of the automatic feeder can be split, you can rinse directly with water, it is recommended to wash once a week
5.MATERIAL:BPA Free. Made of environmentally safe,non-toxic plastic. Protect your pet’s health.

Small & Big Dogs and Cats Automatic Food and Water Feeder Set

3.8L Big Capacity

  • Both cat dog feeder and waterer measures 35.5 x 17.5 x 27 cm / 13.97 x 6.89 x 10.63 inch.
  • Large capacity 3.8L, can last about 7 days for small pets, 3 days for big pets, travel Accessories.
  • you can rest assured to go on vacation, work, party.

Pets Gravity Food and Water Dispenser set

Automatic Gravity Flow Technology

The food feer and water dispenser adopt Natural Gravity Supply System, food and water will gradually fill for pets eat and drink. It is no electricity required at all, can be used anywhere, and suitable for both indoor and outdoor use. perfect for pet parents with busy lifestyles.

  • Food Grade Material: Our feeder and waterer made of food grade plastic, 100% BPA Free. Protect your pet’s health.
  • Fresh Water and Food Anytime: The bowl refills with water/ food as it empties, keeping water and food fresh inside the reservoir until it dispenses.
  • Non-slip Rubber Feet: Non-slip rubber feet ensure safe placement.
  • Easy to Clean: The bottle is easy to unscrew from the base and features a wide mouth bottle for convenient hand-washing.

Read more

Questions and Answers：

  • Q: Will my dog eat much more than he need as this is automatic?
  • A: Usually,the first day when he use it, maybe he will eat much, but our pets are smarter than we think, They will slowly quit this bad habit.
  • Q: Will the water overflow?
  • A: When the water in the water tank reaches a certain height, the spring device in the middle of the barrel mouth will automatically close, and the water will stop flowing; when the water is below a certain height, the spring device will automatically open and continue to flow out.
  • Q: How is the quality? does it have smell?
  • A: We use food grade plastic material, safe and tasteless.

Explore the depths with the Invicta Pro Diver. With a 300-meter water resistance, this watch can withstand the amount of pressure necessary for a deep diving adventure. The chronograph keeps track of your progress, so you can easily time yourself on your underwater adventure and resurface in plenty of time for the rest of your day. An easy-to-read date window is on the dial so you never miss an appointment. This stunning stainless-steel watch with a blue dial is the perfect complement to any outfit, so you can transition between activities seamlessly. Never settle for just a watch. Get a work of art with Invicta.

Each of our Fossil mens’ watches are built to last and embody the bold, creative spirit of their wearers. Through quality craftsmanship, premium features and a keen attention to detail, our watches are made for the everyday-wearer, the adventurer and everyone in between.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 1.73 x 0.87 x 0.47 inches; 0.02 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ ME3098
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Metal batteries required.
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 18, 2015
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Fossil Watches

Transparently cool-Townsman reveals the inner workings of the watch with a innovative see-through dial. Whether dressing for the office or weekend, this timepiece has the mark of distinction
Case size: 44mm; Band size: 22mm; automatic mechanical movement with analog display; skeleton dial reveals the intricate, hand-assembled inner workings of the watch; self-winding; hardened mineral crystal lens resists scratches; imported
Black stainless steel case with black dial; genuine brown leather band with adjustable buckle closure; interchangeable with all 22mm Fossil watch straps
Water resistant to 50m (165ft): suitable for short periods of recreational swimming and showering, but not diving or snorkeling; 5 ATM
An automatic—or self-winding—watch is a mechanical timepiece in which the mainspring is wound automatically from the natural motion of the wearer’s arm. This provides energy to run the watch, making manual winding and a battery unnecessary

OUR STORY

FOSSIL WAS INSPIRED BY AMERICAN CREATIVITY AND INGENUITY

Bringing new life into the watch industry by making quality, fashionable watches that were both fun and accessible. Creativity was at the heart of everything we did.


DESIGN FEATURES

WHAT MAKES US, US

OUR PRODUCT

Our collections celebrate our love for all things vintage with a nod to mid-century design. Our elevated ethos takes root in each and every style.

OUR SUCCESS RECIPE

Optimism, authenticity and, of course, our creative spirit. Everything we make complements every style and fits every lifestyle.

OUR TINSPIRATION

What if a package could communicate the soul of a brand? Our famous tins came to embody our young, fun, authentic brand and creative culture.

SEND A MESSAGE

It only takes a few letters to make a piece personal. Plus: It’s free*. *Available at participating Fossil stores.

MEET OUR COLLECTIONS

Previous page

  1. FOSSIL BLUE

    This collection debuts with four new bands: rich leather, sportier silicone, classic solid steel bracelet and stainless steel mesh bracelet that’s inspired by shark-proof chainmail dive suits.

    SEE NOW

  2. INSCRIPTION

    The square-shaped case was a turning point in watchmaking history. What’s old is new again—this archival Inscription watch is upgraded with a two-layered dial and exposed screws on its topring.

    SEE NOW

  3. BRONSON

    This rugged watch embodies a pioneering spirit. With bold, easy-read indices and luminescent accents, its oversized dial makes it an ideal timepiece for day or night.

    SEE NOW

  4. NEUTRA CHRONOGRAPH

    Refined and versatile, it’s made to be dressed up or dressed down.

    SEE NOW

  5. TOWNSMAN AUTOMATIC

    The skeleton dial on this 1950s-inspired timepiece reveals the intricate, hand-assembled inner workings. The mainspring is wound automatically from the motion of the wearer’s arm—no battery needed.

    SEE NOW

Next page

TIME FOR CHANGE

DESIGN FOR THE FUTURE

Design and produce 100% of our products to meet our pro-planet criteria by 2025.

PRO-PLANET PACKAGING

Make 100% of our primary packaging recyclable and/or reusable by 2025.

REDUCE OUR FOOTPRINT

Reduce water consumption for leather tanning by 45% by 2025. Reduce greenhouse gas emissions by 30% by 2030.

2025 GOAL

Lead in circular business model approaches—where our materials can be used, reused and reduced—by 2025.
